description: This nutritionally approved pea and potato cake recipe is a great snack for the kids. The cakes are packed with veggies and are so easy to make.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Video,Sesame free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Pea & potato cakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cover potatoes with cold water and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add 2 cups peas and cook for 1 minute or until bright green.
Drain peas and potatoes. Add to food processor with egg and parsley, then process for 30 seconds or until smooth. Transfer to a large bowl and fold in flour and remaining peas.

Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Spray with oil. Add 4 x 1/4 cups mixture to pan. Spray tops with oil. Cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a plate. Repeat with remaining pea mixture and oil to make a total of 16. Serve with yoghurt.
